data.message: A Lularoe sales page was having an online party. They played a game that requires you to make as many words as possible or more that others to win. That got me Facebook jail. Not right at all. Not I can't comment on anything. How much longer is this going to last.

replies.message: Hi Becky. Limits are based on different factors, like speed and quantity, but we can't provide additional details on the rate limits that are enforced. If you're blocked from using a feature, you can learn more about feature blocks here: http://bit.ly/2rgzckG. -Jessica
